data.message: Very disappointed that your not coming to Kent. We are a big County. There are plenty of big shopping malls you could have come to.

replies.message: Hi Laura, the truck tour is a huge logistical challenge and takes our teams months of planning in advance with both councils and communities. In previous years we have visited many different locations across GB, but sadly, as mentioned we can't visit every one, each year. We're really sad to hear you're disappointed and will be sure to share your feedback with our teams.
